name: Playtime with Hoogie (Hyperspider Software)
description:
Featuring a new five-day story mode,
you play as a formal school bully named Jacob Johnsmith from a gang, who recently been talking rude to one of his friend's classmate.

As an apology for your friend to the gang, you must force yourself in to a forest that which everybody says that it's haunted by the skeleton-like figure named "Hoogie" for each day and night for about five days.

In order to escape the forest in each day and night, you must collect each different number of keys around the forest scattered; to open the exit gate.
Each day will consist Hoogie's different speed appearance.

Will you save the life of the gang or not, by the evil dreaded Hoogie?

Soon to be free to play on Steam!
